snippet.title: Kilta - Early Access Trailer
snippet.description:
Kilta is a single-player auto battler strategy RPG featuring item management, an interesting story supported by a growing cast of unique characters, charming pixel art in a 2.5D environment, and a stunning soundtrack.

Do you have what it takes to become the greatest Guildmaster on the Twin Continents?

Wishlist Kilta on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1401560/Kilta/
Join our Discord: https://discord.gg/awuYZVg
Follow Kilta and myTrueSound on Twitter: https://twitter.com/KiltaGame
